description.fr:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>Détruire les {ObjectMechanism:486,plural:other} pour activer le {FloorMechanism:262}.</color></rem>
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Pose {value:value} {FloorMechanism:542,value:value!} autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> d'un {ObjectMechanism:486} par joueur en jeu.
\---
Lorsque {Summoning:1394} gagne une {aura:208}\_: Invoque un Mort-Brûlé autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> d'un {ObjectMechanism:486} par {aura:208} qu'il possède.
\---
{PMvalue:pm,+} aux joueurs.
description.en:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>Destroy the {ObjectMechanism:486,plural:other} to activate the {FloorMechanism:262}.</color></rem>
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Places {value:value} {FloorMechanism:542,value:value!} around\_<sprite name="cell_around"> a {ObjectMechanism:486} per player in play.
\---
When {Summoning:1394} gains a {aura:208}: Summons a Deathburn around\_<sprite name="cell_around"> a {ObjectMechanism:486} per {aura:208} that he has.
\---
{PMvalue:pm,+} to players.
description.es:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>Destruir las {ObjectMechanism:486,plural:other} para activar el {FloorMechanism:262}.</color></rem>
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Pone {value:value} {FloorMechanism:542,value:value!} alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de una {ObjectMechanism:486} por jugador en juego.
\---
Cuando {Summoning:1394} gana un {aura:208}: Invoca un fallecinerado alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de una {ObjectMechanism:486} por {aura:208} que tenga.
\---
{PMvalue:pm,+} a los jugadores.
description.de:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>Zerstöre die {ObjectMechanism:486,plural:other}, um den {FloorMechanism:262} zu aktivieren.</color></rem>
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Platziere {value:value}-mal {FloorMechanism:542,value:value!} im Umkreis\_<sprite name="cell_around"> von einem {ObjectMechanism:486} pro Spieler im Spiel.
\---
Wenn {Summoning:1394} eine {aura:208} erhält: Beschwört einen Totgebrannten im Umkreis\_<sprite name="cell_around"> von einem {ObjectMechanism:486} pro {aura:208}, die er besitzt.
\---
{PMvalue:pm,+} bei Spielern.
description.pt:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>Destruir as {ObjectMechanism:486,plural:other} para ativar o {FloorMechanism:262}.</color></rem>
\---
{%FightTurnEnded} Coloca {value:value} {FloorMechanism:542,value:value!} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de uma {ObjectMechanism:486} por jogador presente no jogo.
\---
Quando o {Summoning:1394} ganha uma {aura:208}: Invoca um Morto-Queimado em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de uma {ObjectMechanism:486} por {aura:208} que ele possuir.
\---
{PMvalue:pm,+} aos jogadores.
